text: The Fiat Marea is a car produced by Fiat. It replaced both the Fiat Tempra and the Fiat Croma in 1996, and were replaced by the Fiat Stilo Multi Wagon in 2002. == Engines == === Petrol === * 1.4 12V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.6 16V 76 kW (103 hp) * 1.8 16V 83 kW (113 hp) * 2.0 20V 108 kW (147 hp), 110 kW (150 hp) and 113 kW (154 hp) === Diesel === * 1.9 TD 55 kW (75 hp) and 74 kW (100 hp) * 1.9 JTD 77 kW (105 hp) and 81 kW (110 hp) * 2.4 TD 91 kW (124 hp) * 2.4 JTD 96 kW (130 hp) Marea Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Fiat Marea
